mapper.update: update user_password set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_password = #{loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_password_salt = #{loginPasswordSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, user_name, login_password, login_password_salt, create_time, modify_time from user_password where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, user_id, user_name, login_password, login_password_salt, create_time, modify_time from user_password
select id, user_id, user_name, login_password, login_password_salt, create_time, modify_time from user_password where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
